replies.reply_to_user_name: ญาณศา ธตศกดสกล
replies.name: Itay Filiba

items.content:
Hi Fang Yanisa


Thank you for submitting request for end-to-end live streaming consultancy. Our team, MPO LIVE, supports GBS and their key advertisers that go live on TikTok. 


As mentioned on MPO Livestream Support - FAQ for GBS and PMM, we require at least 2 week notice before the live event flight time. Your request does not meet this requirement. Therefore we won't be able to provide our full support service. However, we might be able to provide limited support in this case.


To assess if this limited support is possible and in what scope, I would appreciate it if you could answer the following questions:

1) What is the client ad spending budget on CI to Live? 

2) What is their budget for this live stream campaign in total (including pre-live, mid-live and post-live campaigns)?

3) Please share this client's media plan or alternatively campaign ID on TTAM showing their CI to LIVE campaigns. 

4) Your client's TikTok account is not a verified account. Why?  
5) What is your client plans for the live stream? What will be shown on screen? 

6) Have they gone live on TikTok before?

7) Are they going to hire production company to produce this live content? Has this company gone live on TT before?  
8) Have they run CI to LIVE campaign before?

9) Do they have an agency that has run CI to LIVE campaign before?


This is a time-sensitive message. Your response is required as soon as possible in order to assess the limited support we can provide in this very short notice request. 


Best regards, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

replies.reply_name: ญาณศา ธตศกดสกล

replies.reply_to_user_name: ญาณศา ธตศกดสกล
replies.name: Itay Filiba

items.content:
Hi Fang, 


Thank you for this useful information. Given the very short notice we got, there is almost no time for preparations. As a result this live stream might be at risk. We will not be able to guarantee that everything will run smoothly and successfully.  


I can offer my limited Scaled Support to reduce some of the risk for this activation. My support will include: 

- Guiding you on the urgent steps you need to take before your client live stream (see below for important guidance).

- Review of their CI to LIVE campaign to make sure it is set up correctly. 

- Answering your questions. Longer response times might occur. 

- My support will be provided on Athena.


Due to short notice request and lack of resources my support will NOT include: 

- Monitoring their live stream during flight time.

- Monitoring their CI to LIVE campaign on TTAM during flight time.

- Real-time support during live stream flight time. 

- Direct communication with your client.


It is important to manage your client expectations on that. 


Guidance and recommendations:

Here are the urgent steps you should take immediately now: 


TnS protection

To minimise the risk of TnS banning this live stream, it is recommended to apply for TnS protection. However, it usually takes 4-6 working days for TnS to process requests. Due to the short notice request, there is a chance that protection will not be approved on time.


Action required: please apply for TnS Copyright protection ASAP using this link: vcp.to/tns . Please provide all details including UID, start time and end time. 


Process time: 4-6 working days 

*I'll try to expedite this, but this might not be possible. 



OBS LIVE Access / LIVE STUDIO access

Many advertisers stream to TikTok by using professional streaming software and not by using their mobile device camera. You mentioned that your client will use LIVE STUDIO. Many advertisers use OBS LIVE.

Action required: you will need to apply for OBS LIVE Access or LIVE STUDIO Access for your client (depending on what they need, more info in the guides). Video guide on how to apply here. Doc here. Due to tight timetable, I would recommend applying for both access (OBS LIVE and LIVE STUDIO). 


Process time: 2-4 working days 


Please take this actions as soon as possible. 


Best regards, 

Itay

replies.reply_to_user_name: ญาณศา ธตศกดสกล
replies.name: Itay Filiba

items.content:
Hi Fang,


Updates

  • Your application for TnS copyright protection has been approved quickly by the TnS team. 


  • Your application for OBS Live access has been approve. Please fine the attached PDF guide about how to go live using streaming software. You can share this file with your client. 


CI to LIVE campaign

I reviewed their campaign on TTAM. Here's my remarks: 


1) Targeted audience - since the CI to LIVE flight time is short, we recommend setting the targeted audience to be 'Broad' or 'Fairly Broad' to have a successful campaign. Your client is targeting a 'Balanced' audience, which is narrow. 


2) Start time and duration - your client set up start time and end time. We recommend setting up start time and duration instead. In this way, if they are late with the start of their live stream, the campaign will run from the time the started their live stream and for the duration from the actual start time. For example, if the set up start time if 18:30, for 1 hour, and then they go live at 18:45 on their TT account, then the campaign will continue running until 18:45 (and not 18:30 if set up end time). 



These are my remarks for the CI to LIVE campaign on TTAM. 


Tip
some advertisers like to start their live stream with a static holding slate saying the show is about to start. This is not the best practice for TikTok and may result their live stream to be tagged as low quality content by the algorithm (and then affecting organic traffic). We recommend avoiding holding slates. 


Hope this is useful. 


Best, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

content.file_name: Go LIVE on TikTok via Browser 2024 - Q1.pdf

items.content:
Thank you so much Itel

Clients have slight change in campaign set up, can you please help look whether it's ok?


CID: 1793290040749057

replies.reply_to_user_name: ญาณศา ธตศกดสกล
replies.name: Itay Filiba

items.content:
Hi Fang, 


The new set up is not recommended at all. We do not recommend:

  • Having two ad groups targeting the same countries.
  • Flight time lower than 60 minutes (currently one ad group is for 50 minutes and the other for 35 minutes)
  • Having narrow targeting for ad groups. 


Please note that as mentioned before, we won't be able to provide real-time support during live stream flight time due to short notice request.  


Best regards, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

Best regards, 

Itay, MPO LIVE
